snippet: Charles C. Johnson, a blogger based in California, may be the ultimate expression of a certain kind of citizen journalism — one far more toxic than we’re accustomed to seeing.
abstract: David Carr The Media Equation column excoriates California blogger Charles C Johnson, saying he may be ultimate expression of toxic and inflammatory citizen journalism; contends Johnson's followers are conspiracy-minded readers who think nation is being overcome by criminals, feminists and politicians who enable them.
lead_paragraph: Charles C. Johnson, a blogger based in California, may be the ultimate expression of a certain kind of citizen journalism — one far more toxic than we’re accustomed to seeing.
